scripts.generate-all-rescale-etsy: npm run generate-images -- --product='blanket' --marketplace='Etsy' && npm run generate-images -- --product='woven' --marketplace='Etsy' && npm run generate-images -- --product='pillow' --marketplace='Etsy' && npm run generate-images -- --product='desk mat' --marketplace='Etsy'
scripts.generate-all-listings-etsy: npm run generate-listings -- --product='blanket' --marketplace='Etsy' && npm run generate-listings -- --product='woven' --marketplace='Etsy' && npm run generate-listings -- --product='pillow' --marketplace='Etsy' && npm run generate-listings -- --product='desk mat' --marketplace='Etsy'
scripts.generate-all-rescale-shopify: npm run generate-images -- --product='blanket' --marketplace='Shopify' && npm run generate-images -- --product='woven' --marketplace='Shopify' && npm run generate-images -- --product='pillow' --marketplace='Shopify' && npm run generate-images -- --product='desk mat' --marketplace='Shopify'
scripts.generate-all-listings-shopify: npm run generate-listings -- --product='blanket' --marketplace='Shopify' && npm run generate-listings -- --product='woven' --marketplace='Shopify' && npm run generate-listings -- --product='pillow' --marketplace='Shopify' && npm run generate-listings -- --product='desk mat' --marketplace='Shopify'
scripts.update-all: npm run update-etsy -- --product='blanket' && npm run update-etsy -- --product='woven' && npm run update-etsy -- --product='pillow' && npm run update-etsy -- --product='desk mat'
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
